titleStmt.title: Truth may be blam'd but not sham'd a sermon upon Matth. 16 v.13, 14, 15, 16 : wherein truth and errour are brought upon the stage act their parts / by William Harvey, minister of the Word.
titleStmt.author: Harvey, William, minister of the Word.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
